feed.title: YTPTube Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.4.0
entry.content:
• 49ac272 auto focus the confirm button in confirm dialog. by @arabcoders
  • caf6033 minor improvements to the bg worker by @arabcoders
  • 1580388 renamed types folder by @arabcoders
  • 84f623f Convert socketStore and stateStore to ts by @arabcoders
  • 09c5d77 Cleaning up the event dispatcher system. by @arabcoders
  • 138a497 only offload to bg worker when needed. by @arabcoders
  • 0f7f22b removed event type ERROR and migrated it's uses to LOG_ERROR by @arabcoders
  • a7e8d24 Completed the events system upgrade and expanded the notifications events with support for apprise. by @arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.5.0
entry.content:
• 94193b8 removed useless log statement. by @arabcoders
  • 472b8cb Fixes #344 by @arabcoders
  • ac2056f Fix text overflow, Closes #345 by @arabcoders
  • e07751c Minor messaging changes by @arabcoders
  • a58921d Showing Premiering right now instead on not live by @arabcoders
  • d0706dd Update yt-dlp to 2025.7.21 by @ArabCoders
  • bdbc2f5 migrate more code to ts by @arabcoders
  • 3f338db Added event for item in archive by @arabcoders
  • 78e09e0 update external dependencies by @arabcoders
  • ca4e3df Fix upgrading and installing pip packages by @arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.5.1
entry.content:
• 6f059c7 nuxt4 migration by @arabcoders
  • 4a01750 Fixed in browser match_str to closely match yt-dlp match_str by @arabcoders
  • c60c14d Fix playlist_autonumber. Closes #351 by @arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.6.0
entry.content:
Hopefully this release fixes the remaining bugs and should be the template for v1.0.0, there are some backwards compatibility things left in the code base, those will be removed for the final release.

  • 438254c Added task to kill debugpy, sometimes vscode leave it behind causing problems during development by @arabcoders
  • 4e1a1e6 Add loading screen by @arabcoders
  • dcaeb7a migrated more code to ts by @arabcoders
  • 584d4e1 Added toggle for task handler. by @arabcoders
  • e44077b typo by @arabcoders
  • 6c7542e Fixed incorrect form control for handler enable by @arabcoders
  • da53055 use info color for exporting icon by @arabcoders
  • 4b0522e Added list view for notifications. by @arabcoders
  • 5942d12 migrated presets.vue to ts by @arabcoders
  • c94a4e5 migrated file browser to ts by @arabcoders
  • 964a24c completed the ts migration by @arabcoders
  • 7b9144b added cli opts support for info extraction endpoint by @arabcoders
  • 781b767 Add support for converting youtube handle channels urls to channel_id. Closes #353 by @arabcoders
  • 36b590c Fix automatic premiere re-queue. by @arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.6.1
entry.content:
• 15ab126 external packages updates by @arabcoders
  • 432f277 respect auto_start when re-queuing item by @arabcoders
  • 918b11f do not consider auto_start False items as stale by @arabcoders
  • 1fbe80c allow custom PPs by @arabcoders
  • 3918fa0 hard reset YTDLPOpts. by @arabcoders
